name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Pinify: Your Pins from Any Online Store
name.de: Pinify: Speichern Sie Produkte aller Läden
name.es: Pinify: guardar artículos de cualquier tienda
name.fr: Pinify: Sauvegardez Produits de tous Magasins
name.it: Pinify: Salva Articoli da ogni Negozio

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Save products from any online retailer in your collections.
short.de: Speichern Sie Produkte von beliebigen Online-Händlern in Ihrer Wunschliste.
short.es: Guarde productos de cualquier minorista en línea en su lista de deseos.
short.fr: Enregistrez les produits de n'importe quel détaillant en ligne dans votre liste de souhaits.
short.it: Salva i prodotti di qualsiasi rivenditore online nella tua lista dei desideri.
short.tr: Farklı alışveriş sitelerindeki ürünleri tek bir yere kaydedin.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Pinify allows your to create collections/wishlists/favorites from ANY ONLINE STORE!

Let's set things up:
1 - Install Pinify Chrome Extension
2 - Sign in to pinify.co

After that, it's all about you!
1 - Browse on ANY shopping website
2 - Add product with 1 click

Pinify transforms your shopping experience.
✘ No countless tabs ✘
✘ No screenshots ✘
✓ Pin any product from any store with 1 click. ✓

Whether you're:
- Planning your dream home
- Keeping up with fashion trends
- Creating a wishlist

Pinify is your go-to tool for organizing everything in one place. A new way to experience online shopping.

Install Pinify today for free and start building your ultimate collection of online treasures! 
Any store. Any product.


______________________________


For those of you who are more into the details:

Key Features:

- One-Click Pinning: Effortlessly add products to your collections from any online store.
- Create Collections: Manage and categorize your finds in neatly organized collections.
- Share Collections: Inspire others by sharing your curated collections with friends and family
- Works on Any Site: Works almost on any online retailers and shopping sites.
- User-Friendly: Enjoy a clean and intuitive interface that makes collection management a breeze.

---

Why Pinify?

- Save Time: No more endless re-finding saved items. Have all your favorite products in one place.
- Stay Inspired: Keep your inspirations alive and revisit your collections anytime.
- Connect & Discover: Join a community of like-minded individuals who love to share and discover new collections.

Pinify is more than just an extension; it's a new way to experience online shopping and collection curation. Install Pinify today and start building your ultimate collection of online treasures!
long.de,es,fr,it:
Discover the easiest way to create, organize, and share your favorite product collections with Pinify!

Are you tired of juggling between countless tabs and bookmarks to keep track of your online finds? Pinify transforms your shopping experience by allowing you to pin products from any online store with just a click. 

Whether you're:
- planning your dream home, 
- keeping up with fashion trends, 
- compiling a wishlist

Pinify is your go-to tool for organizing everything in one place.

---

Key Features:

- One-Click Pinning: Effortlessly add products to your collections from any online store.
- Seamless Organization: Manage and categorize your finds in neatly organized collections.
- Share with Ease: Inspire others by sharing your curated collections with friends and family
- Universal Compatibility: Works across a vast range of online retailers and shopping sites.
- User-Friendly Interface: Enjoy a clean and intuitive interface that makes collection management a breeze.

---

Why Choose Pinify?

- Save Time: No more endless searching. Have all your favorite products in one place.
- Stay Inspired: Keep your inspirations alive and revisit your collections anytime.
- Connect & Discover: Join a community of like-minded individuals who love to share and discover new collections.

Pinify is more than just an extension; it's a new way to experience online shopping and collection curation. Install Pinify today and start building your ultimate collection of online treasures!
